cu.explanation_en: Setting the NG AMF IP address to an invalid format '999.999.999.999' will cause network interface configuration failure and AMF connection error.

du.explanation_en: Setting ra_ResponseWindow to 100 is not in the valid set (1,2,4,8,10,20,40,80), causing invalid RACH configuration and cell setup failure.
du.explanation_zh: 將 ra_ResponseWindow 設定為 100 不在有效集合（1,2,4,8,10,20,40,80）中，會導致無效的 RACH 配置和細胞設定失敗。
